description.value:
This long, silky neckcloth has the ability to be tied into a convincing semblance of an elegant evening scarf, a worker's neck kerchief, an elaborate cravat, or any other neckwear. It also provides a boost to vocal performances, enhancing both projection and the emotive qualities of a performance. In its natural state, this item appears as a long, white silk scarf. A crooner's cravat grants a +1 item bonus to all Performance checks, but this increases to a +2 item bonus for Performance checks to sing.

Activate—Adjust Cravat 2 (illusion, manipulate, visual)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You make adjustments to the crooner's cravat, transforming it into any type of stylish chosen neckwear; as you do so, you cast a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise] on yourself.

Activate—Influential Croon 2 (auditory, emotion, linguistic)

Frequency once per day

Effect You pour emotion into your vocal performance, projecting an empathetic bond that fascinates listeners. You cast enthrall (@Check[type:will|dc:30] save). When you first activate Influential Croon, you can also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Subconscious Suggestion] on one creature within 30 feet (@Check[type:will|dc:30] save).
